content:
on Wednesday the UCSB mens soccer squad competed against a slumping UC Irvine squadwhom they beat earlier this seasonto advance past the Big West semifinals PERIOD The Anteaters denied them passage into the Big West finals defeating the Gauchos  to gain a muchneeded confidence boost PERIOD

The Gauchos now wait to see if they will continue their season into the NCAA tournament PERIOD The NCAA Selection Committee will put together the 48team field next week PERIOD

Photos by Eric Swenson Kenneth Song

Players gather together before the playing of the National Anthem PERIOD Eric SwensonDaily Nexus

UCSB players celebrate after Drew Murphy scored in the first  seconds of the match PERIOD Eric SwensonDaily Nexus

Defender Dylan Murphy  tries to kick the ball away from midfielder Gor Kirakosyan during the first half of the match PERIOD Kenneth SongDaily Nexus

Anteaters and Gauchos battle for the ball PERIOD Eric SwensonDaily Nexus

UC Irvines Michael Sperber  and UCSBs Ismaila Jome tumble into the grass during the second half of the match PERIOD Kenneth SongDaily Nexus

Nick DePuy  far left kneels on the grass in disbelief after he missed the goal on a 1v1 opportunity PERIOD Conversely UCI defender Matthew Tilley  expresses his relief to his teammate Mitchell Alvarez  PERIOD Kenneth SongDaily Nexus

Defender Jack Birkenbeuel left and Nick DePuy struggle for the ball during the first half of the match PERIOD Kenneth SongDaily Nexus

About  people attended the UCSBUC Irvine matchup on Wednesday PERIOD Eric SwensonDaily Nexus

UCSB and UCI players alike prepare for a UCSB penalty kick during the second half of the match PERIOD Eric SwensonDaily Nexus

UC Irvine goalkeeper Michael Breslin catches the ball away from UCSBs Dugan Zier PERIOD Breslin had five saves in the match PERIOD Eric SwensonDaily Nexus

A UCSB player struggles to digest defeat at the hands of the Anteaters who are seen celebrating their triumph in the background PERIOD Kenneth SongDaily Nexus

A UCSB player struggles to digest defeat at the hands of the Anteaters who are seen celebrating their triumph in the background PERIOD Kenneth SongDaily Nexus

Comments are closed PERIOD

Forgetting to take off the ratty AF1s at the potluck most Asian households dont take kindly to shoes in the house

Wearing your only red tshirt to every final Red is a lucky color in many cultures especially Chinese cultures

Putting spiders in your friends wedding dress for good luck Has its origins in old english folklore and represents abundance for the couple

Accidentally summoned a ghost by leaving their chopsticks straight up A superstition that has Chinese origins because the chopsticks are reminiscent of funeral incense

Didnt like your friends significant other so they gifted them an umbrella The word for umbrella san sounds like the word for divorce in Chinese

Believing in horoscopes The modern western zodiac actually came from Babylonian astrology

Walked backwards in Portugal to live out the Faust fantasy In Portugal walking backwards allows the devil to know exactly where you are

Stole a raven from the tower of london as reparations According to UK superstition if there arent  ravens in the tower the kingdom will fall

Breaks a knuckle knocking on wood for good scores on finals Knocking on wood may have originated from the Celts and their love for tree spirits

Drunkenly rearranging their apartment for the feng shui at  AM A Chinese cultural practice that harmonizes a person with the energies of the environment around them

Left out their middle name on their taxes because the Fae run the IRS Giving the Fae your full name gives them power over you and the IRS has too much

Hit by a car but the license plate had an angel number Beyond just blowing up on TikTok angel numbers were invented by.. PERIOD Pythagoras
title: IN PHOTOS: UCSB eliminated from the Big West Semis | The Daily Nexus
name: University of California Santa Barbara
